title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and an attempt is made to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the group dialog should be shown when attempting to create a new table group.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
